semantic_identifier: [GOLD-15]: Standardize capture of customer language/evidence in signal ingestion pipeline
title: Standardize capture of customer language/evidence in signal ingestion pipeline

sections.text: Add a consistent schema for storing customer language and supporting evidence across ingested signals (CRM notes, surveys, support tickets, interviews, usage annotations). Ensure each record captures source type, timestamp, verbatim quote/snippet, and a link/reference back to the original artifact. Backfill defaults for existing records where possible to avoid breaking downstream positioning generation.
